Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Vet.) -- Disabled Vet. Homestead Exemp. - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in LaSalle Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of LaSalle Parish voting on this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 5 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 5 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 years, 10 mills property tax renewal for purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance in Road District No. 5.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 5, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $36,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 6 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 6 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 years, 10 mills property tax renewal for purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance in Road District No. 6.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 6, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $66,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of purchasing equipment, equipment upkeep, road and bridge construction, drainage and road maintenance in the District?
